document_data.name: Darkdance Manor
document_data.owner: [[Myrin Darkdance]] ([[1480 DR]] - ){{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|835}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Darkdance Manor''' was a large decrepit manor located in the west end of [[Westgate]] near [[Tidetown]].
document_data.Structure: The manor had been maintained for years by the family's loyal [[dwarf]] servant [[Elevar]]. The manor had a [[magic]] gate that opened only for family members.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|3439}}
document_data.History: The manor was the ancestral home of [[House Darkdance]] although the last family members abandoned the property decades prior to [[1480 DR]], when [[Myrin Darkdance]] moved into the mansion.
